TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. But they destroy all your ships. Albeit in a rather spectacular fahsion.

I wish for 0.24

You get it. But you explode from the contracts.

I wish for a mudkip friend.

Granted. He kills you with his tackle

I wish for Dishonored II

Granted, but it gets released when Half-Life 3 gets released.

I wish for a pet kerbal.

granted, he flies your car to the moon as it was Jeb

i wish that my computer had GladOS installed

Granted. Your computer doesn't have enough RAM to run GladOS.

I wish for a dark spire of powerful dark wizards based on methane production.

Granted, the spire stinks too badly for anyone to approach.

I wish for happiness.

Granted. After smoking opium that the Wishmaking Communist gave you, you spend the rest of your life paying back to the horrible evil druglord by working on an opium farm for the rest of your life, craving the one moment of happiness the Wishmaking Communist gave you.

I wish StarBound combined with StarMade and Minecraft, plus Terraria and The Powder Toy.

Granted, StarBoundMadeCraftToyarria eats up those last few productive moments of your life, dooming you to trading foodstamps for Internet access.

I wish for a lifetime of non-opiate happiness.

Granted. The Wishmaking Fairy takes out all the parts of your brain but the ones that make you say you're happy. There isn't anything left to enjoy or have the happiness.

I wish my friend stopped asking for music.

Granted. You begin asking him for music instead.

I wish for a frozen orange-juice slush.

Granted, but because it is so frozen it is not a slush anymore.

I wish for ALL THE SCIENCE!!

Granted. You make so much science that your space program is out of business for nothing to do.

I wish for lasers.

Granted. You get two CD players.

I wish for a good night's sleep.

Granted. You never wake up.

I wish for Doctor Who series 8.

Granted. You get a show completely from the doctor's weird shirt pov. All you can see is darkness & some doctoral tools, plus maybe some muffled sound and sometimes the weird shirt opens.

I wish that internets came from the sky.

Granted, but you die from falling modems.

I wish for Cthulhu and the Kraken to fight eachother.

You get caught up in the conflict and die.

I wish for piggies.

Graned. They evolve into pigmen and take over the world. Then they ban mudkips.

I wish for this to happen. (Minus the mudkips.)

Crap, wrong thread...

Edited May 20, 2014 by Floppster
Realisation

(Skipping over the thread before this)

Granted. That happens.

I wish for some of your Grey Poupon.

Granted. You get grey pooped on.

I wish for a self-refilling bag of Skittles.

Granted. The world is flooded with skittles soon, and eventually you drown in skittles.

I want a spare brain.

Which hijacks another body, and kills you.

I wish to build a snowman...

Granted - But during construction one of the bulldozers has ran you over

I want to live on a perfectly habitable place on the moon :^3
